Description:
Bernard tells you that this big shell is his home. 

He explains that his garden of exotic seaweeds is mostly innocuous, but he implores you not to step over his plants. 

He tells you how much he loves to nap in his hammock, but since you don’t have time for a little nap, you may take some algae from his private stock to help you in your mission.
DescriptionAction: Will you accept his offer and take some algae?

    "SSRewardText": "It seems that Bernard is prepared for this contingency, as he has stored a great amount of the seaweed that the Sahti people need. \r\n\nHe loads a couple of sacks with the algae and orders his magical octopus pet to carry them to the Sahti village.     "SSRewardText": "(Bernard): “Mmm… You came here not so long ago, my dear Sigrun. Is your memory failing you again? Wait here. Let me get something for you.” \r\n\nBernard disappears into his house and shortly after appears with a couple of little pouches. He hands one to Sigrun and shows you the other. \r\n\n(Bernard): “Mmm… That one will help you with your memory, Sigrun. Take it three times a day. This one will serve us if my hypothesis is correct. Let’s continue to the obelisk.” ",
